trans-unit.source: Use the MMC menu actions in StorSimple Snapshot Manager | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use the MMC menu actions in StorSimple Snapshot Manager | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use the Microsoft Management Console (MMC) menu actions in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to use the Microsoft Management Console (MMC) menu actions in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you will see the following actions listed on all action menus and all variations of the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: In StorSimple Snapshot Manager, you will see the following actions listed on all action menus and all variations of the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: View
trans-unit.target: View

trans-unit.source: New Window from Here
trans-unit.target: New Window from Here

trans-unit.source: Refresh
trans-unit.target: Refresh

trans-unit.source: Export List
trans-unit.target: Export List

trans-unit.source: Help
trans-unit.target: Help

trans-unit.source: These actions are part of the Microsoft Management Console (MMC) and are not specific to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: These actions are part of the Microsoft Management Console (MMC) and are not specific to StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes these actions and explains how to use each of them in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial describes these actions and explains how to use each of them in StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: You can use the View option to change the Results pane view and to change the console window view.
trans-unit.target: You can use the View option to change the Results pane view and to change the console window view.

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click the View option.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click the View option.

trans-unit.source: To add or remove the columns that appear in the Results pane, click Add/Remove Columns.
trans-unit.target: To add or remove the columns that appear in the Results pane, click Add/Remove Columns.

trans-unit.source: The Add/Remove Columns dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The Add/Remove Columns dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add or remove columns from Results pane</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add or remove columns from Results pane</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Complete the form as follows:
trans-unit.target: Complete the form as follows:

trans-unit.source: Select items from the Available columns list and click Add to add them to the Displayed columns list.
trans-unit.target: Select items from the Available columns list and click Add to add them to the Displayed columns list.

trans-unit.source: Click items in the Displayed columns list, and click Remove to remove them from the list.
trans-unit.target: Click items in the Displayed columns list, and click Remove to remove them from the list.

trans-unit.source: Select an item in the Displayed columns list and click Move Up or Move Down to move the item up or down in the list.
trans-unit.target: Select an item in the Displayed columns list and click Move Up or Move Down to move the item up or down in the list.

trans-unit.source: Click Restore Defaults to return to the default Results pane configuration.
trans-unit.target: Click Restore Defaults to return to the default Results pane configuration.

trans-unit.source: When you are finished with your selections, click OK.
trans-unit.target: When you are finished with your selections, click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click any node, click View, and then click Customize.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click any node, click View, and then click Customize.

trans-unit.source: The Customize dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The Customize dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Customize the console window</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Customize the console window</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select or clear the check boxes to show or hide items in the console window.
trans-unit.target: Select or clear the check boxes to show or hide items in the console window.

trans-unit.source: When you are finished with your selections, click OK.
trans-unit.target: When you are finished with your selections, click OK.

trans-unit.source: You can use the New Window from Here option to open a new console window.
trans-unit.target: You can use the New Window from Here option to open a new console window.

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click any node, and then click New Window from Here.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click any node, and then click New Window from Here.

trans-unit.source: A new window appears, showing only the scope that you selected.
trans-unit.target: A new window appears, showing only the scope that you selected.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you right-click the Backup Policies node, the new window will show only the Backup Policies node in the Scope pane and a list of defined backup policies in the Results pane.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you right-click the Backup Policies node, the new window will show only the Backup Policies node in the Scope pane and a list of defined backup policies in the Results pane.

trans-unit.source: See the following example.
trans-unit.target: See the following example.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>New Window from Here</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>New Window from Here</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Refresh action to update the console window.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Refresh action to update the console window.

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click Refresh.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click Refresh.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Export List action to save a list in a comma-separated value (CSV) file.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Export List action to save a list in a comma-separated value (CSV) file.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can export the list of backup policies or the backup catalog.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can export the list of backup policies or the backup catalog.

trans-unit.source: You can then import the CSV file into a spreadsheet application for analysis.
trans-unit.target: You can then import the CSV file into a spreadsheet application for analysis.

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click Export List.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click Export List.

trans-unit.source: The Export List dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The Export List dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: Complete the form as follows:
trans-unit.target: Complete the form as follows:

trans-unit.source: In the File name box, type a name for the CSV file or click the arrow to select from the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: In the File name box, type a name for the CSV file or click the arrow to select from the drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: In the Save as type box, click the arrow and select a file type from the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: In the Save as type box, click the arrow and select a file type from the drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: To save only selected items, select the rows and then click the Save Only Selected Rows check box.
trans-unit.target: To save only selected items, select the rows and then click the Save Only Selected Rows check box.

trans-unit.source: To save all exported lists, clear the Save Only Selected Rows check box.
trans-unit.target: To save all exported lists, clear the Save Only Selected Rows check box.

trans-unit.source: Click Save.
trans-unit.target: Click Save.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Export list as a comma-separated value file</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Export list as a comma-separated value file</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Help menu to view available online help for StorSimple Snapshot Manager and the MMC.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Help menu to view available online help for StorSimple Snapshot Manager and the MMC.

trans-unit.source: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Click the desktop icon to start StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click Help.
trans-unit.target: In the Scope pane, right-click any node or expand the node and right-click an item in the Results pane, and then click Help.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Learn more about the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Learn more about the StorSimple Snapshot Manager user interface</linkText><title></title>.
